reviewText: The older seducing woman is well played by Susan Lucci and her victim is the always fantastic David Chavet. A great combination. David oozes sex appeal and the camera loves to show off his body, especially in the shower scene. Definately worth buying if you're a fan of David Charvet.
this movie here had my attention all the way i love life time movies and when i seen this movie i had to buy it, thanks to amazon i was able to order it there.
Dvd played great and the case was in great shape too. I am pleased with item.

Susan Lucci is cast to type as a scheming socialite who makes life miserable for the married lover (David Charvet) who leaves her.

For all you lovers of Lifetime movies.
Lucci makes the film worth watchinig.
Great movie with one of my favorite actresses, Susan Lucci
Great movie. I love Susan Lucci. This is one of her best movies.

What more can I say about these two actors and actresses great movie seductive in so many ways from the beautiful gorgeous Susan Lucci to the tall dark and handsome David Charvet! these two were made for each other even though the movie is now about 20 years old I recommend this to any enthusiast DVD lover like myself or any average movie watcher many thanks
This is Susan Lucci at her best; she makes the movie; about a wealthy, heiress hungry for men she can't have

This movie has some good moments but there are missing pieces in the plots scenes. The movie could have added more detail on the husband. And the seducing scenes could be more enticing to lure the young man in.
nice women well done this can really happen i thought she was really pretty  and i kept me watthing it
A Susan Lucci classic - entertaining and easy to watch.  Typical soap-opera style love triangle with a twist.  Not a bad purchase.
